attributes.action: All overseas aid to be scrapped until Great Britain can afford it, then review who gets it
attributes.additional_details: This country cannot at the moment continue to provide aid to other countries when we can't look after ourselves. Let us stop all aid until we, let alone other developed countries, are once again on a more secure footing and then make sure the money sent abroad is NOT lining the pockets of foreign heads of state in front of the people it's meant to be helping
